t: Track Your Amazon Order Status - AfterShip
s: August 25, 2023 - Amazon provides tracking information in the order details, and if an order includes multiple items, each may have separate delivery dates and tracking information. For orders fulfilled by Amazon, tracking is typically available on the "My Orders" page or through the order tracking page link.

t: Amazon Brand Analytics: Get data to grow your business
s: November 2, 2022 - Amazon Brand Analytics is available to brands enrolled in Amazon Brand Registry. Brand Analytics helps businesses better understand their customers and brand performance through aggregated customer search and purchase data.

t: 15 Amazon Analytics and Tracking Tools for Sellers for 2025
s: January 8, 2025 - Amazon offers an analytics tool for third-party sellers, Amazon Brand Analytics, but they only make this available to sellers who own a brand. However, many software makers have filled the gap, and there are now many third-party Amazon analytics and tracking tools for sellers.

t: How to Use Amazon Brand Analytics in 2025 [With Examples!]
s: April 24, 2025 - You can always consult the Metric ... Amazon Brand Analytics reports. ... The Repeat Purchase Behavior Report provides insights into repeat purchase and customer retention patterns by ASIN or brand. You can get a comprehensive breakdown of your unique and repeat purchases at revenue, order, and customer levels and make data-driven decisions to increase brand loyalty and improve your bottom line. t: Brand Stores: Create a brand page on Amazon for free | Amazon Ads
s: Use Brand Store Insights to track sales, visits, page views, traffic sources, and more to help better understand how to best serve shoppers. The dashboard includes metrics such as daily visitors and sales generated from your Brand Store.

t: Resource Library - Trustworthy Shopping at Amazon
